GeneDef.label: postshift recovery
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites that stabilize the carrier after a shapeshift.

customEffectDescriptions.li: If, <color=#8a8ae6>after</color> using <color=#8a8ae6>shapeshift</color>, a pawn receives this gene, then <color=#8a8ae6>xenogermination coma</color> effect <color=#8a8ae6>are removed</color>.

GeneDef.label: postshift regeneration
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites that regenerate all wounds, even critical ones, before a shapeshift.

customEffectDescriptions.li: If a pawn has this gene, it is guaranteed to <color=#8a8ae6>heal all scars</color> and <color=#8a8ae6>regrow missing parts</color> when using the <color=#8a8ae6>shapeshfit</color> ability.

GeneDef.label: postshift metabolism
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites that significantly increase metabolism after shapeshift.

customEffectDescriptions.li: If, after using the <color=#8a8ae6>shapeshift</color> ability, a pawn receives this gene, then for some time its <color=#8a8ae6>hunger</color> is significantly <color=#8a8ae6>reduced</color>.
